MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 05-DEC-2020 16:00.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a power cut in the G33 postcode area of Glasgow, affecting properties in Kirkwood Avenue and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 5.30PM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of further investigations required to our underground cable network and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4.00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was recorded at 8.58AM on 05 December 2020.
